keyword: how many calories is in fried chicken wings
title: How Many Calories Are in Fried Chicken Wings?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in fried chicken wings for a typical serving of 6, plus protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and easy tweaks to adjust the count.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Fried Chicken Wings?
assumptions: Breaded and deep-fried, with skin; average size (~50g per wing); restaurant-style, no sauce or dipping.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, breading, frying method, wing size, and added seasonings. Check labels or apps for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A typical serving of 6 fried chicken wings provides about 1200 kcal and 84 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp buffalo sauce per wing

faqs.q: How many calories is in one fried chicken wing?
faqs.a: About 200 kcal for one breaded, deep-fried wing with skin.

faqs.q: How many calories is in fried chicken wings for 6 pieces?
faqs.a: Roughly 1200 kcal total, with high fat and sodium content.

faqs.q: Are fried chicken wings high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, 6 wings provide ~84 g protein, great for muscle building.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in fried chicken wings?
faqs.a: About 72 g total fat for 6 wings, mostly from skin and frying oil.

faqs.q: Do fried chicken wings have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, ~2400 mg for 6 wings due to breading and seasoningâ€”watch intake.
